hero.title: Boutique French Wines
hero.subtitle: Discover the Hidden Gems of France. One Sip at a Time.

philosophy.title: Discover the Hidden Gems of France.
philosophy.description: Vinessence is a boutique French wine importer based in Thailand. We carefully curate our portfolio by working directly with small, independent producers from France's most iconic regions. Every bottle reflects the unique character of its terroir, the dedication of its winemaker, and the artisanal tradition behind its creation.

who_we_serve.support_text: Whether you're developing a new wine list or looking for exclusive labels, our experienced team offers full support and consultation.

contact.title: Interested in Our Wines?

wines.collection_description: Discover our carefully curated selection of boutique French wines, each chosen for its exceptional quality and unique character.

intro.title: Intro
intro.paragraph1: Vinessence was founded with a clear purpose: to bring Thailand's restaurants, hotels, and wine professionals direct access to authentic boutique French wines — wines that are crafted with passion, heritage, and a deep respect for terroir.
intro.paragraph2: We don't chase trends or commercial brands. Instead, we focus on quality, character, and relationships — selecting only wines that we believe in, from people we trust.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.paragraph1: Vinessence is not a mass-market importer.
who_we_are.paragraph2: We specialize in boutique French wines from independent, family-owned producers. Every bottle in our collection is the result of hands-on sourcing, personal vineyard visits, and long-term partnerships with artisans who represent the heart of French winemaking.
who_we_are.paragraph3: Our portfolio is curated with purpose — balancing well-known regions like Bordeaux and Burgundy with hidden gems from the Loire, Rhône, Languedoc, and beyond.

why_boutique.title: Why Boutique Wines Matter
why_boutique.paragraph1: Boutique wines offer something mass-produced bottles never can: a sense of place, story, and soul. These wines are made by people — not factories — and reflect generations of tradition, respect for nature, and a deep connection to the land.
why_boutique.paragraph2: They're not made for supermarket shelves.
why_boutique.paragraph3: They're made for people who care about what's in the glass.

partnership.title: Personal partnerships with wineries
partnership.description: We work directly with producers — no brokers, no shortcuts.

sourcing.title: Boutique-scale sourcing
sourcing.description: Limited-production wines, selected for quality, not quantity.

storage.title: Temperature-controlled storage and reliable nationwide delivery
storage.description: Your wines are kept in optimal condition from France to your venue.

assistance.title: Personalized wine selection assistance tailored to your restaurant or venue
assistance.description: We help you find the right wines for your concept, guests, and pricing strategy.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Exceptional French Wines?
cta.description: Let's discuss how our boutique wine collection can enhance your venue's offering and delight your guests.
